no benefit other than clock to uob one account card spend for bonus interest

For UOB One I managed to hit the $500 spend on the very last day of April but it seems the spend is tracked as this May onwards. So I did not receive the bonus interest. Any point to call up UOB to give me chance?
U can try as it happened to me before but they rejected
Amaze card has higher spread than trust card (i.e. bit more expensive) but allow us to earn credit card rewards. The rewards are usually worth it.
I think u can try but u have to make up the spending as well.
Any advice on which cards to use when going china? I know need to use Alipay n save in CC
I just called UOB and they will appeal  but the condition is this month got to spend like $600 according to the officer to make up for it or something
For UOB one  they tracked by posting date. If your posting date is in May which I guess when you said you did spending on the last day  then unlikely they will help you.
Good to hear that. But do your spending a few days before end of the month so you won’t miss the boat
I had a friend who was in the same situation. His appeal was not successful
All these still up to the banks discretion.
Maybe first time and new cardholder that's why they waive
